channel.title: Member
channel.description: Hello, My question is, how do i make it so only members can wear partyhats like i have to make them a member not where they have to pay just to where i have to make them member. Also only for me the owner. On a devo v7 based.

item.title: Member
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

search for

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

in client.java

Then underneath that add

if(member == 0) for(int i : Item.member_items) if(wearID == i) { sM("You must be a member to wield this item."); return false; }

Now search for this in item.java

  public static int shields[] = {

add this after the }

public static final int[] member_items = (ITEMIDHERE};

This is providing you’ve got you’re

member; already declared and set-up ect.

Read full topic
